ComicInfo.Title: The Unknown Vampire; Bride of Doom; Strange Machine; The Curse of Rada!
ComicInfo.Summary: Joe is to be the best man in his pal's wedding, but the groom-to-be isn't really comfortable in marrying a girl who is very mysterious, refuses to have pictures taken at the wedding, and who has selected a honeymoon site that she refuses to share with her fiancee. Joe himself is concerned because there have been other weddings involving this woman, all of which led to mysterious disappearances afterwards.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 19:11:53. [Issue ID 9958]
